title: Thick and Thin Serif, please help identify!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418191700im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_4116.jpg)
 I know I have seen this before, just can't place it, please help identify! Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418191700/http:/typophile.com/files/type_87.jpg) | 23.77 KB |
author: huhn76

comments.content: It could be **[Baskerville Old Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418191700/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Baskerville%20Old%20Face%20-%20Regular&fid=9ecec61376083fd290b75d94fdaca380&fsize=60&text=asis&fit=1)** but the |s| looks different/modified.
